📢 We’re Hiring: Trainee Executive (Day Shift)🚀 Vacancies: 5💼 Position: Trainee Executive📍 Location: Dhaka🕘 Employment Type: Full-time🕘 Shift: Day Shift🎓 Qualification: Bachelor’s or Master’s (BBA/MBA preferred)💰 Salary: Tk. 30,000 – 35,000 per month🆕 Freshers are encouraged to apply✅ Requirements:✔️ Strong analytical, mathematical, and research skills✔️ Excellent written and verbal English communication skills✔️ Proficiency in Microsoft Office and understanding of professional business etiquette✔️ Team-oriented with strong problem-solving abilities✔️ Willingness to take on additional responsibilities✔️ Ability to meet tight deadlines and work under pressure🏢 About the CompanyWe are a back office based in Bangladesh supporting retirement plan TPA services for our main offices located in Houston, Texas, Louisiana, and Oklahoma, USA. We design and administer retirement plans tailored to meet the needs of both business owners and employees. Learn more at: ldsco.com💼 About the PositionYou will assist in drafting, reviewing, and maintaining retirement plan documents in compliance with IRS and ERISA regulations.📝 Job Responsibilities:* Assist in drafting and updating plan documents (e.g., 401(k), Profit Sharing, Defined Benefit) per IRS and DOL guidelines* Review and process adoption agreements and amendments according to client specifications and regulatory requirements* Analyze and interpret Plan Documents, Amendments, Notices, and Summary Plan Descriptions* Communicate concerns proactively with Team Leaders and Management* Support plan restatements and termination processes by preparing necessary legal documentation* Maintain accurate documentation logs and ensure timely compliance updates* Collaborate with internal teams and clients to collect required plan information and resolve document-related issues🎁 Other Benefits:* Fully Subsidized Lunches and Snacks* Provident Fund* Annual Bonus* Two Festival Bonuses* Maternity/Paternity Allowance* Health and Life Insurance* Gratuity* Annual Salary Review* Yearly Company Tour📩 Apply NowIf you meet the qualifications and are ready to advance your career with a leading retirement plan consulting firm, send your resume to HRBD@LDSCO.COM📌 Please mention the position “Trainee Executive (Day Shift)” in the subject line.🗓️ Deadline: 31st July, 2025hashtag#JobOpening hashtag#HiringNow hashtag#CareerOpportunity hashtag#BangladeshJobs hashtag#BBA hashtag#MBA hashtag#LDSCO hashtag#Recruitment hashtag#Trainee hashtag#Executive

Dear HR teams, founders, and everyone who’s ever hired an intern,Most internships feel the same.You join. You overthink everything.You pitch an idea, they smile, then ignore it.You do "tasks" just to stay busy.You leave with a certificate… but no real growth.Zero ownership. Zero trust. Zero impact.But my last internship was like every fresher's dream internship.I wasn’t just “the intern.”I was part of the team.I pitched bold ideas, some flopped, some flew.But I had the space to try.It was about the trust.And that trust?That’s what made me care more. Do better. Show up fully.If you’re hiring interns, here’s something to think about:We don’t need bean bags, or pizza Fridays.We need to feel like our ideas matter. Like our effort isn’t invisible. Like we’re building something that counts.That’s how you turn an internship into a turning point.Thank you, Fabrikaloom, for setting the bar high.Sincerely,One intern who’ll never forget what good leadership feels like.hashtag#internshipdiaries hashtag#genzworkplace hashtag#hrcommunity hashtag#linkedincommunity hashtag#workculturematters

Dear HR teams, founders, and everyone who’s ever hired an intern,Most internships feel the same.You join. You overthink everything.You pitch an idea, they smile, then ignore it.You do "tasks" just to stay busy.You leave with a certificate… but no real growth.Zero ownership. Zero trust. Zero impact.But my last internship was like every fresher's dream internship.I wasn’t just “the intern.”I was part of the team.I pitched bold ideas, some flopped, some flew.But I had the space to try.It was about the trust.And that trust?That’s what made me care more. Do better. Show up fully.If you’re hiring interns, here’s something to think about:We don’t need bean bags, or pizza Fridays.We need to feel like our ideas matter. Like our effort isn’t invisible. Like we’re building something that counts.That’s how you turn an internship into a turning point.Thank you, Fabrikaloom, for setting the bar high.Sincerely,One intern who’ll never forget what good leadership feels like.hashtag#internshipdiaries hashtag#genzworkplace hashtag#hrcommunity hashtag#linkedincommunity hashtag#workculturematters

Dear HR teams, founders, and everyone who’s ever hired an intern,Most internships feel the same.You join. You overthink everything.You pitch an idea, they smile, then ignore it.You do "tasks" just to stay busy.You leave with a certificate… but no real growth.Zero ownership. Zero trust. Zero impact.But my last internship was like every fresher's dream internship.I wasn’t just “the intern.”I was part of the team.I pitched bold ideas, some flopped, some flew.But I had the space to try.It was about the trust.And that trust?That’s what made me care more. Do better. Show up fully.If you’re hiring interns, here’s something to think about:We don’t need bean bags, or pizza Fridays.We need to feel like our ideas matter. Like our effort isn’t invisible. Like we’re building something that counts.That’s how you turn an internship into a turning point.Thank you, Fabrikaloom, for setting the bar high.Sincerely,One intern who’ll never forget what good leadership feels like.hashtag#internshipdiaries hashtag#genzworkplace hashtag#hrcommunity hashtag#linkedincommunity hashtag#workculturematters

Dear HR teams, founders, and everyone who’s ever hired an intern,Most internships feel the same.You join. You overthink everything.You pitch an idea, they smile, then ignore it.You do "tasks" just to stay busy.You leave with a certificate… but no real growth.Zero ownership. Zero trust. Zero impact.But my last internship was like every fresher's dream internship.I wasn’t just “the intern.”I was part of the team.I pitched bold ideas, some flopped, some flew.But I had the space to try.It was about the trust.And that trust?That’s what made me care more. Do better. Show up fully.If you’re hiring interns, here’s something to think about:We don’t need bean bags, or pizza Fridays.We need to feel like our ideas matter. Like our effort isn’t invisible. Like we’re building something that counts.That’s how you turn an internship into a turning point.Thank you, Fabrikaloom, for setting the bar high.Sincerely,One intern who’ll never forget what good leadership feels like.hashtag#internshipdiaries hashtag#genzworkplace hashtag#hrcommunity hashtag#linkedincommunity hashtag#workculturematters

Dear HR teams, founders, and everyone who’s ever hired an intern,Most internships feel the same.You join. You overthink everything.You pitch an idea, they smile, then ignore it.You do "tasks" just to stay busy.You leave with a certificate… but no real growth.Zero ownership. Zero trust. Zero impact.But my last internship was like every fresher's dream internship.I wasn’t just “the intern.”I was part of the team.I pitched bold ideas, some flopped, some flew.But I had the space to try.It was about the trust.And that trust?That’s what made me care more. Do better. Show up fully.If you’re hiring interns, here’s something to think about:We don’t need bean bags, or pizza Fridays.We need to feel like our ideas matter. Like our effort isn’t invisible. Like we’re building something that counts.That’s how you turn an internship into a turning point.Thank you, Fabrikaloom, for setting the bar high.Sincerely,One intern who’ll never forget what good leadership feels like.hashtag#internshipdiaries hashtag#genzworkplace hashtag#hrcommunity hashtag#linkedincommunity hashtag#workculturematters

Dear HR teams, founders, and everyone who’s ever hired an intern,Most internships feel the same.You join. You overthink everything.You pitch an idea, they smile, then ignore it.You do "tasks" just to stay busy.You leave with a certificate… but no real growth.Zero ownership. Zero trust. Zero impact.But my last internship was like every fresher's dream internship.I wasn’t just “the intern.”I was part of the team.I pitched bold ideas, some flopped, some flew.But I had the space to try.It was about the trust.And that trust?That’s what made me care more. Do better. Show up fully.If you’re hiring interns, here’s something to think about:We don’t need bean bags, or pizza Fridays.We need to feel like our ideas matter. Like our effort isn’t invisible. Like we’re building something that counts.That’s how you turn an internship into a turning point.Thank you, Fabrikaloom, for setting the bar high.Sincerely,One intern who’ll never forget what good leadership feels like.hashtag#internshipdiaries hashtag#genzworkplace hashtag#hrcommunity hashtag#linkedincommunity hashtag#workculturematters

Dear HR teams, founders, and everyone who’s ever hired an intern,Most internships feel the same.You join. You overthink everything.You pitch an idea, they smile, then ignore it.You do "tasks" just to stay busy.You leave with a certificate… but no real growth.Zero ownership. Zero trust. Zero impact.But my last internship was like every fresher's dream internship.I wasn’t just “the intern.”I was part of the team.I pitched bold ideas, some flopped, some flew.But I had the space to try.It was about the trust.And that trust?That’s what made me care more. Do better. Show up fully.If you’re hiring interns, here’s something to think about:We don’t need bean bags, or pizza Fridays.We need to feel like our ideas matter. Like our effort isn’t invisible. Like we’re building something that counts.That’s how you turn an internship into a turning point.Thank you, Fabrikaloom, for setting the bar high.Sincerely,One intern who’ll never forget what good leadership feels like.hashtag#internshipdiaries hashtag#genzworkplace hashtag#hrcommunity hashtag#linkedincommunity hashtag#workculturematters

Dear HR teams, founders, and everyone who’s ever hired an intern,Most internships feel the same.You join. You overthink everything.You pitch an idea, they smile, then ignore it.You do "tasks" just to stay busy.You leave with a certificate… but no real growth.Zero ownership. Zero trust. Zero impact.But my last internship was like every fresher's dream internship.I wasn’t just “the intern.”I was part of the team.I pitched bold ideas, some flopped, some flew.But I had the space to try.It was about the trust.And that trust?That’s what made me care more. Do better. Show up fully.If you’re hiring interns, here’s something to think about:We don’t need bean bags, or pizza Fridays.We need to feel like our ideas matter. Like our effort isn’t invisible. Like we’re building something that counts.That’s how you turn an internship into a turning point.Thank you, Fabrikaloom, for setting the bar high.Sincerely,One intern who’ll never forget what good leadership feels like.hashtag#internshipdiaries hashtag#genzworkplace hashtag#hrcommunity hashtag#linkedincommunity hashtag#workculturematters

Dear HR teams, founders, and everyone who’s ever hired an intern,Most internships feel the same.You join. You overthink everything.You pitch an idea, they smile, then ignore it.You do "tasks" just to stay busy.You leave with a certificate… but no real growth.Zero ownership. Zero trust. Zero impact.But my last internship was like every fresher's dream internship.I wasn’t just “the intern.”I was part of the team.I pitched bold ideas, some flopped, some flew.But I had the space to try.It was about the trust.And that trust?That’s what made me care more. Do better. Show up fully.If you’re hiring interns, here’s something to think about:We don’t need bean bags, or pizza Fridays.We need to feel like our ideas matter. Like our effort isn’t invisible. Like we’re building something that counts.That’s how you turn an internship into a turning point.Thank you, Fabrikaloom, for setting the bar high.Sincerely,One intern who’ll never forget what good leadership feels like.hashtag#internshipdiaries hashtag#genzworkplace hashtag#hrcommunity hashtag#linkedincommunity hashtag#workculturematters

Dear HR teams, founders, and everyone who’s ever hired an intern,Most internships feel the same.You join. You overthink everything.You pitch an idea, they smile, then ignore it.You do "tasks" just to stay busy.You leave with a certificate… but no real growth.Zero ownership. Zero trust. Zero impact.But my last internship was like every fresher's dream internship.I wasn’t just “the intern.”I was part of the team.I pitched bold ideas, some flopped, some flew.But I had the space to try.It was about the trust.And that trust?That’s what made me care more. Do better. Show up fully.If you’re hiring interns, here’s something to think about:We don’t need bean bags, or pizza Fridays.We need to feel like our ideas matter. Like our effort isn’t invisible. Like we’re building something that counts.That’s how you turn an internship into a turning point.Thank you, Fabrikaloom, for setting the bar high.Sincerely,One intern who’ll never forget what good leadership feels like.hashtag#internshipdiaries hashtag#genzworkplace hashtag#hrcommunity hashtag#linkedincommunity hashtag#workculturematters

Dear HR teams, founders, and everyone who’s ever hired an intern,Most internships feel the same.You join. You overthink everything.You pitch an idea, they smile, then ignore it.You do "tasks" just to stay busy.You leave with a certificate… but no real growth.Zero ownership. Zero trust. Zero impact.But my last internship was like every fresher's dream internship.I wasn’t just “the intern.”I was part of the team.I pitched bold ideas, some flopped, some flew.But I had the space to try.It was about the trust.And that trust?That’s what made me care more. Do better. Show up fully.If you’re hiring interns, here’s something to think about:We don’t need bean bags, or pizza Fridays.We need to feel like our ideas matter. Like our effort isn’t invisible. Like we’re building something that counts.That’s how you turn an internship into a turning point.Thank you, Fabrikaloom, for setting the bar high.Sincerely,One intern who’ll never forget what good leadership feels like.hashtag#internshipdiaries hashtag#genzworkplace hashtag#hrcommunity hashtag#linkedincommunity hashtag#workculturematters

Dear HR teams, founders, and everyone who’s ever hired an intern,Most internships feel the same.You join. You overthink everything.You pitch an idea, they smile, then ignore it.You do "tasks" just to stay busy.You leave with a certificate… but no real growth.Zero ownership. Zero trust. Zero impact.But my last internship was like every fresher's dream internship.I wasn’t just “the intern.”I was part of the team.I pitched bold ideas, some flopped, some flew.But I had the space to try.It was about the trust.And that trust?That’s what made me care more. Do better. Show up fully.If you’re hiring interns, here’s something to think about:We don’t need bean bags, or pizza Fridays.We need to feel like our ideas matter. Like our effort isn’t invisible. Like we’re building something that counts.That’s how you turn an internship into a turning point.Thank you, Fabrikaloom, for setting the bar high.Sincerely,One intern who’ll never forget what good leadership feels like.hashtag#internshipdiaries hashtag#genzworkplace hashtag#hrcommunity hashtag#linkedincommunity hashtag#workculturematters

Dear HR teams, founders, and everyone who’s ever hired an intern,Most internships feel the same.You join. You overthink everything.You pitch an idea, they smile, then ignore it.You do "tasks" just to stay busy.You leave with a certificate… but no real growth.Zero ownership. Zero trust. Zero impact.But my last internship was like every fresher's dream internship.I wasn’t just “the intern.”I was part of the team.I pitched bold ideas, some flopped, some flew.But I had the space to try.It was about the trust.And that trust?That’s what made me care more. Do better. Show up fully.If you’re hiring interns, here’s something to think about:We don’t need bean bags, or pizza Fridays.We need to feel like our ideas matter. Like our effort isn’t invisible. Like we’re building something that counts.That’s how you turn an internship into a turning point.Thank you, Fabrikaloom, for setting the bar high.Sincerely,One intern who’ll never forget what good leadership feels like.hashtag#internshipdiaries hashtag#genzworkplace hashtag#hrcommunity hashtag#linkedincommunity hashtag#workculturematters

Dear HR teams, founders, and everyone who’s ever hired an intern,Most internships feel the same.You join. You overthink everything.You pitch an idea, they smile, then ignore it.You do "tasks" just to stay busy.You leave with a certificate… but no real growth.Zero ownership. Zero trust. Zero impact.But my last internship was like every fresher's dream internship.I wasn’t just “the intern.”I was part of the team.I pitched bold ideas, some flopped, some flew.But I had the space to try.It was about the trust.And that trust?That’s what made me care more. Do better. Show up fully.If you’re hiring interns, here’s something to think about:We don’t need bean bags, or pizza Fridays.We need to feel like our ideas matter. Like our effort isn’t invisible. Like we’re building something that counts.That’s how you turn an internship into a turning point.Thank you, Fabrikaloom, for setting the bar high.Sincerely,One intern who’ll never forget what good leadership feels like.hashtag#internshipdiaries hashtag#genzworkplace hashtag#hrcommunity hashtag#linkedincommunity hashtag#workculturematters

Dear HR teams, founders, and everyone who’s ever hired an intern,Most internships feel the same.You join. You overthink everything.You pitch an idea, they smile, then ignore it.You do "tasks" just to stay busy.You leave with a certificate… but no real growth.Zero ownership. Zero trust. Zero impact.But my last internship was like every fresher's dream internship.I wasn’t just “the intern.”I was part of the team.I pitched bold ideas, some flopped, some flew.But I had the space to try.It was about the trust.And that trust?That’s what made me care more. Do better. Show up fully.If you’re hiring interns, here’s something to think about:We don’t need bean bags, or pizza Fridays.We need to feel like our ideas matter. Like our effort isn’t invisible. Like we’re building something that counts.That’s how you turn an internship into a turning point.Thank you, Fabrikaloom, for setting the bar high.Sincerely,One intern who’ll never forget what good leadership feels like.hashtag#internshipdiaries hashtag#genzworkplace hashtag#hrcommunity hashtag#linkedincommunity hashtag#workculturematters

Dear HR teams, founders, and everyone who’s ever hired an intern,Most internships feel the same.You join. You overthink everything.You pitch an idea, they smile, then ignore it.You do "tasks" just to stay busy.You leave with a certificate… but no real growth.Zero ownership. Zero trust. Zero impact.But my last internship was like every fresher's dream internship.I wasn’t just “the intern.”I was part of the team.I pitched bold ideas, some flopped, some flew.But I had the space to try.It was about the trust.And that trust?That’s what made me care more. Do better. Show up fully.If you’re hiring interns, here’s something to think about:We don’t need bean bags, or pizza Fridays.We need to feel like our ideas matter. Like our effort isn’t invisible. Like we’re building something that counts.That’s how you turn an internship into a turning point.Thank you, Fabrikaloom, for setting the bar high.Sincerely,One intern who’ll never forget what good leadership feels like.hashtag#internshipdiaries hashtag#genzworkplace hashtag#hrcommunity hashtag#linkedincommunity hashtag#workculturematters

Dear HR teams, founders, and everyone who’s ever hired an intern,Most internships feel the same.You join. You overthink everything.You pitch an idea, they smile, then ignore it.You do "tasks" just to stay busy.You leave with a certificate… but no real growth.Zero ownership. Zero trust. Zero impact.But my last internship was like every fresher's dream internship.I wasn’t just “the intern.”I was part of the team.I pitched bold ideas, some flopped, some flew.But I had the space to try.It was about the trust.And that trust?That’s what made me care more. Do better. Show up fully.If you’re hiring interns, here’s something to think about:We don’t need bean bags, or pizza Fridays.We need to feel like our ideas matter. Like our effort isn’t invisible. Like we’re building something that counts.That’s how you turn an internship into a turning point.Thank you, Fabrikaloom, for setting the bar high.Sincerely,One intern who’ll never forget what good leadership feels like.hashtag#internshipdiaries hashtag#genzworkplace hashtag#hrcommunity hashtag#linkedincommunity hashtag#workculturematters

Dear HR teams, founders, and everyone who’s ever hired an intern,Most internships feel the same.You join. You overthink everything.You pitch an idea, they smile, then ignore it.You do "tasks" just to stay busy.You leave with a certificate… but no real growth.Zero ownership. Zero trust. Zero impact.But my last internship was like every fresher's dream internship.I wasn’t just “the intern.”I was part of the team.I pitched bold ideas, some flopped, some flew.But I had the space to try.It was about the trust.And that trust?That’s what made me care more. Do better. Show up fully.If you’re hiring interns, here’s something to think about:We don’t need bean bags, or pizza Fridays.We need to feel like our ideas matter. Like our effort isn’t invisible. Like we’re building something that counts.That’s how you turn an internship into a turning point.Thank you, Fabrikaloom, for setting the bar high.Sincerely,One intern who’ll never forget what good leadership feels like.hashtag#internshipdiaries hashtag#genzworkplace hashtag#hrcommunity hashtag#linkedincommunity hashtag#workculturematters

Dear HR teams, founders, and everyone who’s ever hired an intern,Most internships feel the same.You join. You overthink everything.You pitch an idea, they smile, then ignore it.You do "tasks" just to stay busy.You leave with a certificate… but no real growth.Zero ownership. Zero trust. Zero impact.But my last internship was like every fresher's dream internship.I wasn’t just “the intern.”I was part of the team.I pitched bold ideas, some flopped, some flew.But I had the space to try.It was about the trust.And that trust?That’s what made me care more. Do better. Show up fully.If you’re hiring interns, here’s something to think about:We don’t need bean bags, or pizza Fridays.We need to feel like our ideas matter. Like our effort isn’t invisible. Like we’re building something that counts.That’s how you turn an internship into a turning point.Thank you, Fabrikaloom, for setting the bar high.Sincerely,One intern who’ll never forget what good leadership feels like.hashtag#internshipdiaries hashtag#genzworkplace hashtag#hrcommunity hashtag#linkedincommunity hashtag#workculturematters
